law.catch_line: Appeals from county administrator to board.
law.text: Appeals from the orders of a county administrator may be taken to the board by filing with the board within thirty (30) days a certified copy of the orders of the county administrator. Matters at issue shall be heard by the board as upon an original proceeding. Appeals from orders of the county administrator shall be governed by KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1998. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554b-110.
